data.title: Biography of King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark 1786
meta_keywords: King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark 1786-1848
data.meta_description: Biography of King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark 1786-1848 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
On 18 Sep 1786 King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark was born to Prince Frederick Oldenburg (age 32) and Duchess Sophia Frederica of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (age 28).

On 29 Nov 1794 [his mother] Duchess Sophia Frederica of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (age 36) died.

On 12 Oct 1799 [his future brother-in-law] Hereditary Grand Duke Frederick Louis of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (age 21) and Grand Duchess Elena Pavlovna of Russia (age 14) were married. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George I of Great Britain and Ireland 1660-1727. .

On 07 Dec 1805 [his father] Prince Frederick Oldenburg (age 52) died.

On 21 Jun 1806 King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark (age 19) and Duchess Charlotte Frederica of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (age 21) were married. They were first cousins..

On 06 Oct 1808 [his son] Frederick VII King Denmark 1808-1863 was born to King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark (age 22) and [his wife] Duchess Charlotte Frederica of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (age 23).

In 1810 King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark (age 23) and Duchess Charlotte Frederica of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (age 25) were divorced after her alleged affair with her singing teacher Édouard Du Puy. She was exiled; she never saw her one year old son again.

In 1814 King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark (age 27) succeeded I King Norway.

In 1815 King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark (age 28) and Caroline Amalie Oldenburg Queen Norway (age 18) were married. They were half first cousin once removed. She a great x 2 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland 1683-1760. She by marriage Queen Consort Norway. She the daughter of Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1765-1814 and Louise Auguste possible father Johann Friedrich Struensee Oldenburg Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 43).

On 29 Nov 1819 [his brother-in-law] Hereditary Grand Duke Frederick Louis of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (age 41) died.

In 1829 [his brother-in-law] Frederick Emil Oldenburg (age 28) and Henriette Danneskjold SamsøeDanneskiold Samsøe were married. He a great x 2 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland 1683-1760. He the son of Frederick Christian Oldenburg II Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg 1765-1814 and Louise Auguste possible father Johann Friedrich Struensee Oldenburg Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Augustenburg (age 57).

In 1839 King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark (age 52) succeeded VIII King Denmark. [his wife] Caroline Amalie Oldenburg Queen Norway (age 42) by marriage Queen Consort Denmark.

On 13 Jul 1840 [his wife] Duchess Charlotte Frederica of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (age 55) died.

On 20 Jan 1848 King Christian I of Norway and VIII of Denmark (age 61) died. His son [his son] Frederick VII King Denmark 1808-1863 (age 39) succeeded VII King Denmark.

On 09 Mar 1881 [his former wife] Caroline Amalie Oldenburg Queen Norway (age 84) died.
